title: `module load httpie` breaks CentOS 7's yum.
body:
I'm sharing this mostly as a tale of woe (whoa!) about `LD_LIBRARY_PATH` and dynamically linked system utilities....

I'm on `CentOS 7`.  `yum` generally works.  If I load the Lmod `httpie` module, `yum` no longer works.

```
[hartzelg@lb114esx ~]$ yum
Loaded plugins: fastestmirror, package_upload, priorities, product-id, search-disabled-repos, subscription-manager
You need to give some command
Usage: yum [options] COMMAND

List of Commands:

check          Check for problems in the rpmdb
[...]
  Plugin Options:
    --samearch-priorities
                        Priority-exclude packages based on name + arch
[hartzelg@lb114esx ~]$ module load httpie
[hartzelg@lb114esx ~]$ yum
There was a problem importing one of the Python modules
required to run yum. The error leading to this problem was:

   No module named yum

Please install a package which provides this module, or
verify that the module is installed correctly.

It's possible that the above module doesn't match the
current version of Python, which is:
2.7.13 (default, Apr  3 2017, 11:00:36)
[GCC 5.4.0]

If you cannot solve this problem yourself, please go to
the yum faq at:
  http://yum.baseurl.org/wiki/Faq


```

It's not simply about `PYTHONPATH`.

Unsetting `LD_LIBRARY_PATH` seems to be necessary and sufficient to allow `yum` to work again.

It appears that `yum` is walking down `LD_LIBRARY_PATH` looking for its dynamic libraries and that it finally explodes when it can't find the `yum.{py,pyc,so}` or `yummodule.so` that it's looking for.

```
[hartzelg@lb114esx ~]$ env | grep LD_LI | perl -lape 's|:|\n\t|g'
LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/sc1/apps/spack/v0.0.4/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-5.4.0/httpie-0.9.8-ixdavn5dp2ez2uuakdr2orfgdnuyrj2j/lib
	/sc1/apps/spack/v0.0.4/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-5.4.0/py-setuptools-34.2.0-xg7nyhso2yxps743kk4ratautn524owi/lib
	/sc1/apps/spack/v0.0.4/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-5.4.0/py-packaging-16.8-3xz24kzyrjcqoczes6qgegfaagqoxmgb/lib
	/sc1/apps/spack/v0.0.4/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-5.4.0/py-pyparsing-2.1.10-jy3oijylzlqnuyucgzhyqb5xov2nrgk6/lib
	/sc1/apps/spack/v0.0.4/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-5.4.0/py-appdirs-1.4.0-xgqfdm7p2hlidxfqforyxsha64y5mozh/lib
	/sc1/apps/spack/v0.0.4/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-5.4.0/py-six-1.10.0-ypzymijzwfzknoiakdp3wmgbkfhbsuve/lib

	/sc1/apps/spack/v0.0.4/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-5.4.0/py-argparse-1.4.0-y5f4nwlqi4q47555sevg3clagc3rxvah/lib
	/sc1/apps/spack/v0.0.4/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-5.4.0/py-requests-2.13.0-g47vc7o2pif7nq6gzozgzjgc4wouohdo/lib
	/sc1/apps/spack/v0.0.4/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-5.4.0/py-pysocks-1.6.6-qodfcvpa2udpyli65b5jlwroz5hr4jme/lib

	/sc1/apps/spack/v0.0.4/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-5.4.0/readline-7.0-3i26nubtox6ovme4bedn6l6oirjo3pas/lib
	/sc1/apps/spack/v0.0.4/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-5.4.0/sqlite-3.8.5-dbam2y3tg7dd7gmioqybhc6g67avd6a5/lib
	/sc1/apps/spack/v0.0.4/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-5.4.0/openssl-1.0.2k-5s7cetd6mdyveeiqqas6rtcwjvyp3afq/lib
```
